name: Brixer Upper
description:
After inheriting a nearly-abandoned shopping district, it's up to you to bring this abandoned district back to life!

Created for Miz-Jam 1.

Uses this artkit: 

https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

========================

Unfortunately, I am terrible at time management, and didn't get to add nearly as much as I wanted to. I will likely release a more updated version down the line.

This is my first game jam submission, so feedback is encouraged!
